items.sentence: Tom had no idea if Mary\'s allegations were true.
I could have sworn that I saw Tom downtown today.
I could hear Tom playing his guitar and yodeling.
Are you certain Tom wasn\'t the one who did that?
Are you sure we\'re going in the right direction?
I had to lend Tom money so he could pay his rent.
Would you like to know why Tom doesn\'t like you?
My father is paying back a huge loan on our home.
A man with a gun attempted to commandeer the bus.
Let\'s hear what you\'ve got to say for yourself.
